summary: I WAS BACKING OUT OF A PARKING SPACE.  THE REARVIEW CAMERA ON THE FORD SYNC SYSTEM WOUND UP SHOWING A FROZEN IMAGE.  IT TOOK ME SEVERAL SECONDS TO REALIZE THAT THE IMAGE I WAS LOOKING AT WAS ACTUALLY AN OLD IMAGE!  I WAS LUCKY I DID NOT RUN INTO SOMEONE SINCE I WAS ESSENTIALLY BACKING UP WITHOUT THE ABILITY TO SEE ANYTHING.
